page.title: 19GREAT MEOLS:HOUSING SURVEY.
page.content:
This survey data has been taken from a {random sample}questionaire distributed to{100}homes in assigned area:
{64%}of the houses are semi-detached, {36%}detached.Main building material is brick{(83%).87%}of roofs are tile{,11% slate. All properties have gardens,front and rear,14% on 3 sides,4% on all 4 sides. Only 9% of houses lack a garage,53% of garages being detached from the house. Property ages range from{1 to 90+ yrs. Half being between{46-60 years old. 49% of properties surveyed have 3 bedrooms,38% 4 bedrooms,13% 5 or more. The majority(56%) have two main living rooms,38% 3 living rooms.Two houses have 4 rooms designated as living space.A high proportion(49%) have two bathrooms. 33% of houses have addded extensions.
